attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that when you phone a company to get a new quote you are given a free 0800 number to phone but if you need to contact their so called customer services you have to phone a high cost 0870 number.
They are making money from you all the time you are on the line so what is their incentive to stop that repetitive music and actually pick up the phone? All companies should be forced to provide an alternative 01/02 number or just hold up their hands and admit to fleecing their customers at every opportunity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
